alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and southeastern Charlton Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking bands of heavy rainfall along the Florida-Georgia State-Line from Statenville to St George, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Drainage ditch and roadway flooding due to heavy rainfall. Some dirt roads are likely impassable due to mud. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Taylor, St. George and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
